name: SneakyToast
description:
Speedy backwards puzzle platformer. Play as a ninja Toast with buttery smooth moves and attempt to get to the start of the level. Retraces the steps Toast made to get to the finish line.

Controls
A/D - Move left/right
E - Interact with grey blocks
F - Catch shuriken
R - Restart level

Asset Credits
Sound: https://opengameart.org/content/fantasy-sound-effects-library (Little Robot Sound Factory), https://opengameart.org/content/rpg-sound-pack (artisticdude)

Background Music: https://opengameart.org/content/ninja-anthem-edm-beat (ISAo)

Toast: https://opengameart.org/content/sneaky-toast (David Harrington)

Platforms/Blocks: https://opengameart.org/content/arcade-platformer-assets (GrafxKid)
